articles.summary: Jaxson Dart led the Giants to a convincing 34-17 win over the Eagles on Thursday night, a victory that they hope begins to change the perception of the team, which went 3-14 last season.

articles.title: Jets LB Johnson to play after missing 3 games
articles.summary: Jets edge rusher Jermaine Johnson, who missed three games with an ankle injury, will play Sunday against the Broncos at London's Tottenham Hotspur Stadium.

articles.title: Chiefs' Jones owns up to not chasing Lawrence
articles.summary: Seen watching as Trevor Lawrence scrambled for the Jaguars' winning touchdown over the Chiefs, Chris Jones said he will do better going forward and that such an incident "won't happen again."
